title: PBE STORE GLITCH
body:
The mystery chest in the PBE store says that it was IP ,but in realty it was RP and I received a message saying I didn't have enough RP to buy the item. And thats when noticed when my RP was gone. I have some screenshots if needed. 

PBE Player 
Junchris23

replies.body:
Hiya! 

For PBE bugs in the future, please use the [PBE bug report tool](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create) on the PBE boards. ^-^ It better helps us keep track of issues occurring on live vs. PBE. 

We'll take a look and see what's going on here. Thanks for the report!
